data.name: BackButtonText
data.value: ← Back

data.name: PageTitle
data.value: IT Strategy

data.name: Intro_Heading
data.value: When do you need this service?

data.name: Intro_Point1
data.value: You're planning custom software but need accurate cost estimates before committing.

data.name: Intro_Point2
data.value: You have a business idea and need to translate it into precise technical requirements.

data.name: Intro_Point3
data.value: You want expert guidance on choosing the optimal tech stack and toolset.

data.name: Step1_Title
data.value: Listening in detail to understand your business need

data.name: Step1_Point1
data.value: Conduct stakeholder interviews to uncover key pain-points and objectives

data.name: Step1_Point2
data.value: Map out existing workflows and data-flows to identify gaps

data.name: Step1_Point3
data.value: Clarify success metrics and technical constraints upfront

data.name: Step1_Point4
data.value: Align on project scope, timeline, and regulatory requirements

data.name: Step2_Title
data.value: Identifying your budgeting options

data.name: Step2_Point1
data.value: Break down costs by development phases, licensing, and maintenance

data.name: Step2_Point2
data.value: Explore various delivery models: fixed-price, time-and-materials, hybrid

data.name: Step2_Point3
data.value: Compare on-premise vs. cloud hosting expense profiles

data.name: Step2_Point4
data.value: Perform ROI analysis and total cost of ownership (TCO) projections

data.name: Step3_Title
data.value: Creating multiple IT strategic solutions for your needs

data.name: Step3_Point1
data.value: Draft alternative architectures: microservices vs. monolith, SaaS vs. custom

data.name: Step3_Point2
data.value: Specify recommended tech stacks (frontend, backend, data storage)

data.name: Step3_Point3
data.value: Assess scalability, security, and compliance implications of each option

data.name: Step3_Point4
data.value: Provide high-level timelines and resource plans per scenario

data.name: Step4_Title
data.value: Reviewing each option together and selecting the best fit

data.name: Step4_Point1
data.value: Walk through pros, cons, and risk factors for every strategy

data.name: Step4_Point2
data.value: Answer questions and refine assumptions in real time

data.name: Step4_Point3
data.value: Prioritize features against budget and timeline constraints

data.name: Step4_Point4
data.value: Finalize a clear, actionable roadmap with defined milestones
